mandelbrot
  • Reference

Convert Mandelbrot object to data.frame for plotting

Converts objects produced by mandelbrot to tidy data.frames for use with ggplot and other tidyverse packages.

# S3 method for mandelbrot
as.data.frame(mandelbrot)

Arguments

mandelbrot

a Mandelbrot set object produced by mandelbrot

Value

a 3-column data.frame

Examples


mb <- mandelbrot()
df <- as.data.frame(mb)
head(df)
#>           x  y value
#> 1 -2.000000 -2     1
#> 2 -1.993322 -2     1
#> 3 -1.986644 -2     1
#> 4 -1.979967 -2     1
#> 5 -1.973289 -2     1
#> 6 -1.966611 -2     1
